title: MRI scans shows promise in predicting dementia

title_detail.value: MRI scans shows promise in predicting dementia

summary: Doctors may one day be able to gauge a patient's risk of dementia with an MRI scan, according to a new study. Using a new technique for analyzing MRI data, researchers were able to predict who would experience cognitive decline with 89 percent accuracy.
